content.raw:
I think ideally this would be added to the rest of the floating course elements, but currently it only really models the buoyancy of a cylinder.

‌

This can come in a later PR, but my idea for a refactor:

‌

Instead of specifying area/height/center of volume, the user specifies a collision name. The plugin checks what kind of geometry the collision is, and models the buoyancy for each of the 3 shape primitives in gazebo \(box, cylinder, sphere\), and defaults to the bounding box for DAE meshes.
